availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Daniel Mayes Bowmar, Sr. (Woodford County, Kentucky, resident)

body.p: Woodford County, Kentucky, resident. Woodford County, Kentucky, native. Son of Herman Bowmar, Jr., and Emeline Tunis Bowmar. Resident in Woodford County, Kentucky, in 1850. Resident in Woodford County in 1860. Household owned one enslaved person in Woodford County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Woodford County, District 1, p. 428B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Woodford County, Versailles, p. 431A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Woodford County, Versailles, p. 833.
"Daniel Mayes Bowmar Sr. (1843-1890)," Find A Grave, Memorial #102927291, accessed September 27, 2021, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/102927291.
William Edward Railey, History of Woodford County, Kentucky (Frankfort, KY: Roberts Print, Co., 1928) 85-86.
